name: Tales of Luldog
description:
Tales of Luldog is a punishing platformer made by iLLMaTiC and Devon. Story:

Help Luldog go thru his rocky past.
Game is based around AdmiralBulldog and mainly made for the community around him.

Donations: 

We decided to use this site because of recommendations from previous reddit posts. The game IS FREE and we don't rely on donations, but we allowed that option for people that want to support the game. We made it for fun and not money.
Rich people WeirdChamp

Help 
Report any bugs here in comments, we will be fixing stuff and updating the build when needed.

Consider donating if you think we should do more of this stuff, in a way better quality and on a bigger scale.

You can contact me with ideas and concepts that are game related on twitter @ShubhamRajanwar
